-- in --
| c1 | c2  | c3 |
| -- | --: | -- |
| a  |   1 | i  |
| b  | 2.0 | ii |
-- markdown --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
c1, c2,  c3
a,    1, i 
b,  2.0, ii
-- in --
| c1 | c2 | c3 |
| -- | -- | -- |
| a  |    | i  |
| b  |    | ii |
-- empty cells --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
c1, c2, c3
a,  ,   i 
b,  ,   ii
-- in --
# My table

| c1 | c2  | c3 |
| -- | --: | -- |
| a  |   1 | i  |
| b  | 2.0 | ii |
-- with extra md stuff blank line --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
c1, c2,  c3
a,    1, i 
b,  2.0, ii
-- in --
| `c1` | c2  | c3 |
| ---- | --: | -- |
| a    |   1 | i  |
| b    | 2.0 | ii |
-- with inline format --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
c1, c2,  c3
a,    1, i 
b,  2.0, ii
-- in --
| [c1][foo] | c2  | c3 |
| --------- | --: | -- |
| a         |   1 | i  |
| b         | 2.0 | ii |
-- with inline links --
{"Markdown": true}
-- want --
[c1][foo], c2,  c3
a,           1, i 
b,         2.0, ii
-- in --
| c1 | c2  | c3 |
-- just header --
{"Markdown": true}
-- err --
could not find Markdown table
-- in --
| c1 | c2  | c3 |
| a  |   1 | i  |
-- just header and row --
{"Markdown": true}
-- err --
could not find Markdown table
